snippet: The Swedish fans had come a long way, drawn by the chance to experience the European soccer championships on the cheap. England ended their hopes with a 3-2 victory.
abstract: Swedish fans, who traveled more than 800 miles to cheer their country's team at the European soccer championships in Kiev, Ukraine, have their hopes dashed when England defeats Sweden, 3-2, in first round.
lead_paragraph: The Swedish fans had come a long way, drawn by the chance to experience the European soccer championships on the cheap. England ended their hopes with a 3-2 victory.

headline.seo: Euro 2012 — The Dream Dies in Camp Sweden
headline.main: At Camp Sweden, the Party Goes On Even After England Ends the Dream
headline.print_headline: Sweden’s Ouster Dampens Party At Fans’ Campsite
